name: Amunets Curiosity and Exploration - v1.0.2
description:
This mod clouds the ingame map - you need to explore the world to see.
For players who wish to go out on an adventure - probably for new maps ;)

Progress is saved in Single-Player and on each the Server.

Discord @ https://discord.gg/a8hGAKW
author: LilMissHentai
